text: 24 is a 2016 Indian Tamil-language Sci-fi thriller movie. It was written and directed by Vikram Kumar. The film is a Time travel fiction movie, in which film's star actor Suru had played triple roles, alongside with lead actress' Nithya Menen, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Saranya Ponvannan. == Cast == * Suriya is in three roles: ** Dr. Sethuraman, a scientist who invented the watch ** Athreya, Sethuraman's twin brother ** Manikandan "Mani" Sethuraman, Another name is Subramani, who is Sethuraman's son * Samantha Ruth Prabhu as Sathya * Nithya Menen as Priya Sethuraman, Sethuraman's wife * Saranya Ponvannan as Sathyabama, Mani's adopted mother * Ajay as Mithran, Athreya's assistant * Girish Karnad as Sathya's Grandfather * Mohan V. Raman as Sathya's father * Sudha as Sathya's mother * Sathyan as Saravanan, Mani's friend * Charle as Reddiyar * Appukutty as Reddiyar's staff * Harsha Vardhan as Kalai, electrician/watchman who works for Athreya * Natarajan Balkrishna as Sathya's uncle * T S Ranganathan as Sathya's uncle == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2016 movies Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:2010s Indian movies Category:Time travel movies Category:Tamil-language movies
title: 24 (2016 movie)
